agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 8:30 AM, Wednesday, May 1, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Brian Birdwell HB 303 Paul SP: Taylor Relating to entities eligible to authorize the creation of a spaceport development corporation. HB 1331 Thompson, Ed SP: Miles Relating to the application fee for a permit for a municipal solid waste facility; imposing a fee. HB 1627 Morrison SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the removal of certain counties from the Texas emissions reduction plan. HB 1767 Murphy | et al. SP: Birdwell Relating to the consideration of employee compensation and benefits in establishing the rates of gas utilities. SB 1070 Watson Relating to certain programs under the Texas Clean Air Act that reduce vehicle emissions and improve air quality; authorizing a fee. SB 1355 Powell Relating to the establishment of the work-based learning task force. Public testimony will be limited to 2 minutes. If submitting written testimony, you must include your name or the name of your organization on each copy, and you must likewise email a digital copy to the clerk of the committee.
